name: Real Gangster Crime Simulator 3D: Escape City Cops
name_original: Real Gangster Crime Simulator 3D: Escape City Cops
description:
Get ready to play car theft simulator and steal cars from Las Vegas, the city of crime. Town is full of rich people, you are out of money and want to avenge from ruling system. Joining the mafia gang and steal cars from different spots and fighting with your enemies. Become the top gangster and robber in town cross all the limits.


It's a complete fight simulation game, full of stunts and adventure. Be a bad man and rule the city with your crimes and make a new robber gang. In this mafia game stealing cars from citizens in presence of cops is difficult. Prove your skills and become the best car robber in town. Stealing cars & destroying them is one interesting part of this game. Police is trying hard to catch you, drive as fast as you can and rule the city in this action simulator game.


Download This Action pack game and give us your feedback, So We can Make More New games for you.
